professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in SQL Server across multiple versions. Proven track record in high availability solutions, backup/recovery processes, and database security configuration.

key_responsibilities: Manage database backups and recovery processes
Optimize SQL Server performance and capacity planning
Collaborate with application teams for database management and troubleshooting
Migrate/decommission over 500 databases within a 4-month project window
Assist application teams in creating databases
Monitor servers for resource utilization (disk space
Implement high availability solutions including mirroring
